alert.note: Alert for Lee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:10PM CDT until August 03 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lee County in east central Alabama... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 510 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lakeview to near Still Waters Resort, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Auburn, Opelika, Notasulga, Smiths, Smiths Station, Waverly, Beulah, Beans Mill, Auburn University, Beauregard, Bleecker, Griffen Mill, Ladonia, Loachapoka, Robert G. Pitts Airport, Monterey Heights, Chewacla State Park, Roxana, Marvyn and Mount Jefferson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
